title: Stunning Revelations About The Raid (Ep 1830)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking new revelations about the Mar a Lago raid. 

News Picks:

Is there a Russiagate coverup related to the tyrannical Mar a Lago raid?

Twitter is interfering in ANOTHER election.


Ex-CIA chief endorses executing leakers of nuclear secrets after Trump raid bombshell.

Atlantic op-ed claims Catholic rosary has become ‘an extremist symbol.’

Important news about Rumble.
